name: Bots Rush:Tower defense
description:
Bots Rush is a unique mix of Tower Defense and logistic puzzle.

You will find a set of interesting and complicated game levels, original enemies. Your task is  simply to build a network of roads to deliver resources to factories and ammo to towers. Sounds easy, right? Lets check this out.

Chapter 1 includes 18 levels!

P.S. This game is also available on Google Play as "beta version" with in-app purchases. Check it out on your android smartphone or tablet.
